titleStmt.title: Some further reasons humbly offered by the sailors, to the consideration of the honourable House of Commons, for taking off the Q's and R's set upon their names in the Navy books.

notesStmt.note: Half-title on p. [1]: Lamentable case of the sailors of the English Navy ...
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).

Reproduction of original in: California State Library.
